summary: This document is an email forwarding a link to a New York Post article dated January 18, 2020. The article reports on a new lawsuit filed by an accuser who alleges Jeffrey Epstein sexually abused her when she was 13 years old and instructed her to wear children's underwear.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the forwarded news article, which details a new lawsuit alleging he sexually abused a girl when she was 13.

events.title: New York Post Article on Epstein Lawsuit
events.description: The New York Post publishes an article reporting on a new lawsuit filed by an accuser against Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Email Forwarding Article
events.description: An email is sent containing a link to the New York Post article about the new Epstein lawsuit.

keyFacts: A New York Post article dated January 18, 2020, reports on a new lawsuit against Jeffrey Epstein.
The lawsuit involves an accuser who alleges Epstein sexually abused her when she was 13 years old.
The accuser alleges Epstein told her to wear children's underwear.
The document is an email from January 22, 2020, forwarding a link to this article.
